item.title: Video emerges of Minneapolis shooting filmed by ICE agent who opened fire
item.description: The clip shows the moments before gunfire rang out on a Minneapolis street.

item.title: US film stars Meagan Good and Jonathan Majors become Guinea citizens after DNA tests
item.description: The pair join other US celebrities reconnecting with their African heritage and taking up citizenship.

item.title: Iran medics describe overwhelmed hospitals as protests continue
item.description: There were signs authorities were intensifying their crackdown as protests continued.

item.title: Musk says X outcry is 'excuse for censorship'
item.description: The government is urging Ofcom to use all its powers – up to and including an effective ban – against X.

item.title: Rescuers race to find dozens missing after deadly landfill collapse in Philippines
item.description: The landslide happened when a mountain of rubbish collapsed at a landfill site in the central Philippines.
